title: Update Insider Trading List
description: A compliance officer needs to add a new executive to the company's insider trading list, restricting when they can trade company stock.

tasks.description: Identify the new executive who needs to be added to the restricted list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the new employee.

tasks.description: Add the executive to the insider list in the compliance system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the person to the list.

tasks.description: Send a notification to the executive explaining the trading restrictions and blackout periods.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear communication to the executive about their new obligations.
